examples: His ancestors had come to America from Ireland.
Sus antepasados ​​habían llegado a Estados Unidos desde Irlanda.
a reptile that was the common ancestor of lizards and turtles
un reptil que era el ancestro común de las lagartijas y tortugas
The ancestor of the modern bicycle was called a penny-farthing.
El antepasado de la bicicleta moderna se llamaba penny-farthing.
He gave them to our ancestor himself.
Se los dio a nuestro antepasado en persona.
